hu.trigary.iodine.api.player

Interface IodinePlayer


  • public interface IodinePlayer
    A class that associates Iodine data with a Minecraft player. References to this class' instances should must disposed of as soon as the player logs off.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IodinePlayer.State
      Represents the state of a player in terms of modded-GUI support.

    • Method Summary

      Gets the player's name.
      @Nullable IodineGui getOpenGui()
      Gets the GUI that this player currently has opened.

      Gets the actual player object that this instance is associated with.

      Gets the state this player is currently in.

      • isModded

        @Contract(pure=true)
default boolean isModded()
        Returns whether this player has successfully logged in with a valid mod version.
        Returns:
        true if this player is in the modded state, false otherwise

      • getOpenGui

        @Nullable
 @Contract(pure=true)
@Nullable IodineGui getOpenGui()
        Gets the GUI that this player currently has opened. Returns null if this player doesn't have any opened. This operation is also valid for non-modded players, and will always return null.
        Returns:
        the GUI this player is viewing or null, if the player doesn't have one opened

      • closeOpenGui

        void closeOpenGui()
        Closes this player's currently opened IodineGui. Doesn't do anything if the player doesn't have one opened. This operation is also valid for non-modded players, and will always do nothing.

      • getOverlays

        @NotNull
 @Contract(pure=true)
@NotNull java.util.Set<IodineOverlay> getOverlays()
        Gets the overlays that this player has displayed. This operation is also valid for non-modded players, and will always return an empty collection.
        Returns:
        the overlays this player has displayed

      • closeOverlay

        void closeOverlay(@NotNull
                  @NotNull IodineOverlay overlay)
        Closes this player's specified IodineOverlay. Doesn't do anything if the player doesn't have it displayed. This operation is also valid for non-modded players, and will always do nothing.
        Parameters:
        overlay - the overlay to close
